page.title: 16Primary Schools - Paignton
page.content: In Collaton Primary School there are four classrooms and the school is almost 100 years old. There are almost exactly the same number of boys and girls, fifty six and fifty eight. The school has one computer and three televisions. The Headmaster teaches all the mathematics in the Junior School using Fletcher Maths. The school was working on the Domesday Project when we visited. School starts at 9:15a.m., and morning playtime is between 10:40 - 10:55 and in the afternoon from 2:30 to 2:45. Dinner is from 12:10 to 1:15p.m. The school uses the Brixham swimming pool. There are three teachers plus the Headmaster in the school.
